name: Knight Speed
description:
Overview
Embark on an epic medieval adventure in this fast-paced endless runner. As a valiant knight, leap across perilous towers, skillfully shoot down enemies with your trusty bow, and protect your kingdom while racing against the relentless passage of time.



Controls
To jump, press the Spacebar. Press the Spacebar again in the air to double jump. Aim using the Mouse Cursor, and while jumping, click the Left Mouse Button to shoot. You can pause the game at any time by pressing the Escape key.
